conditionAlert: You have not selected a condition
conditionsQuestion: What would you like to combine?
ruleDescription: Choose what fits - a flag, a capital or a country. Guess right and earn star!
ruleTimerDescription: You have two minutes to unswer 10 questions.
ruleMistakesDescription: Three mistakes - and you`r are out. Start over! You're also losing a star
ruleStarsDescription: Get all 10 right - earn a star. Collect 4 stars to unlock the super level!
ruleHintDescription: Remove two wrong options. Only three times per round
